mapper.select:
select
from video where id not in (select video_id from video_episode)
select a.id, a.name, a.first_char from video a where #{countPerFirstChar} >= (select count(1) from video b where a.first_char = b.first_char and a.id < b.id) order by a.first_char asc, a.name asc
mapper.update: update video set rank = #{rank} where source_id = #{sourceId}
